name: Upoma Maeve
review_text: Amazing food. PERIOD.  Service is always perfect, food is always on point, and the staff is very friendly and accommodating.

name: Nourine Aurelia
review_text: I stayed here for three nights in November 2021. What an amazing hotel. I had a very great time. The gym was not that great!

name: Lucas Vázquez
review_text: Clean, modern, and had a fantastic view over Sylhet. The rooms were big for Sylhet standards. I can't complain. The bar was fantastic.

name: Erine Ophelia
review_text: Excellent!!! Wonderful place to stay. I don’t normally stay in hostels but this was perfect - the beds are comfortable. The gym was not that great!

name: Toufiq Alahi
review_text: I had a great time meeting everyone and socializing yet when I wanted to, I could get a quiet night’s sleep. I had a very great time. The food was  great!

name: Alahi Nipun
review_text: The rooms are quiet despite the fact that if you want to, you can spend time outside with other travelers and the staff - who, by the way, were exceptional.

name: Farzana Fariha
review_text: All of the facilities were clean and modern. The restaurant located inside the hotel was delicious. I dined here for breakfast and dinner.

name: Aditi Matilda
review_text: I was greeted with such kindness which continued throughout my stay. I booked the king room and it was situated on the 14th floor.

name: Wojciech Szczęsny
review_text: Always looking forward to this place with my friends, the fried vanilla ice cream is exceptionally good!  The room was fantastic.
